Articles.Content:
it's official, KSP now has steam trading cards

you can collect, Bill, Bob, Jebediah, Gene, Wernher von Kerman, ground crew, recruit, and mechanics

Ahh! And here I'm stuck (well, I chose to do it, but still) collecting the last of my free drops from Offspring Fling. Also does anyone know if the developer gets paid if I buy a card from their game?

Ahh! And here I'm stuck (well, I chose to do it, but still) collecting the last of my free drops from Offspring Fling. Also does anyone know if the developer gets paid if I buy a card from their game?

if your talking about the steam community market than I don't think so, but I'm not 100% sure
How do you get the cards?

How do you get the cards?

steam automatically drops cards at some intervals while your playing the game, you could just idle at the title screen and earn cards
Of course this comes when I am stuck on "vacation".

Well my Steam Transfer broke.

Hooray.

steam automatically drops cards at some intervals while your playing the game, you could just idle at the title screen and earn cards

Except that you can only earn HALF of the number of cards a game can drop by playing the game. You have to trade to get a set.

I find it funny that you made a thread, when there's already a thread about it, right under this thread.

Ahh! And here I'm stuck (well, I chose to do it, but still) collecting the last of my free drops from Offspring Fling. Also does anyone know if the developer gets paid if I buy a card from their game?

I would think they would get paid something...

Of course this comes when I am stuck on "vacation".

Of course the Steam Summer Sale comes when I don't have enough money (that I'm willing to use) for another 3 days. XD

Except that you can only earn HALF of the number of cards a game can drop by playing the game. You have to trade to get a set.

Quoting from Steam:

"How can I earn more drops?

You are now eligible for a booster pack

Once you have received all of your card drops, you become eligible for a booster pack containing 3 additional cards. Booster packs are granted randomly to eligible users as more badges are crafted by members of the community. Make sure you log in to Steam each week to maintain eligibility."

Edited July 14, 2013 by Deejay2000
Dat grammar

I'm going to buy KSP again because its on sale, and because of the cards.

Edit: Changed my mind

Edited July 14, 2013 by TooManyErrors

I find it funny that you made a thread, when there's already a thread about it, right under this thread.

I would think they would get paid something...

Of course the Steam Summer Sale comes when I don't have enough money (that I'm willing to use) for another 3 days. XD

Quoting from Steam:

"How can I earn more drops?

You are now eligible for a booster pack

Once you have received all of your card drops, you become eligible for a booster pack containing 3 additional cards. Booster packs are granted randomly to eligible users as more badges are crafted by members of the community. Make sure you log in to Steam each week to maintain eligibility."

check the thread creation time, I made this one before someone made that redundant other thread

whats the deal with the cards? Are they literally just virtual trading cards that people spend money on, or do they do something special? Is it just another "look, I spent more money than you and have these cool fake cards" thing?

whats the deal with the cards? Are they literally just virtual trading cards that people spend money on, or do they do something special? Is it just another "look, I spent more money than you and have these cool fake cards" thing?

No, it's more about owning every damn thing possible with Jeb's glorious face stamped on it. Sure, they give you new Steam profile backgrounds, emotes, stuff like that, but at the end of the day nothing is cooler than throwing all your space-related virtual achievements at your Steam friends. Because friends love Steam achievements.
Just got my set completed!

Just got my set completed!

Yup I didn't get a single flight crew Kerman, just all the support staff and Wernher. Might go finish off the collection with the dregs of my Steam Wallet, heh. Only 15p per card! It's not like I'm gonna spend 60p on anything else
This kinda makes me wanna get steam and transfer it to it.
hehe working on my kinetic void collection now XD its like ksp with guns (and less physics, and purely sandbowx, and even earlier alpha )
I wish I had someone to trade with, I'm stuck with 3 copies of jebediah xD I only needed one, that's enough awesomeness

No, it's more about owning every damn thing possible with Jeb's glorious face stamped on it. Sure, they give you new Steam profile backgrounds, emotes, stuff like that, but at the end of the day nothing is cooler than throwing all your space-related virtual achievements at your Steam friends. Because friends love Steam achievements.

ah ok. I gotcha. Thanks for explaining

EDIT:damn I turned them into a badge:(

Edited July 15, 2013 by Spartwo
